title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 110.3 - Grant limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 110.3 - Grant limits

State Regulations

Except upon good cause shown to the commissioner, no grant
for financial assistance to an eligible applicant shall exceed
$5,000. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
110.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
